title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS, Linux, Docker. Pull and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embeddings, JSON mode, custom modelfiles.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same features as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration: use Ollama models as LLM, chat, or embeddings inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (Docker one-liner, model manager, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, embeddings, custom options.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST API; chat, generate, pull, delete models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama completions inline like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin: generate code, refactor, or chat with any Ollama model from within Vim.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that forwards messages to a local Ollama instance and streams replies.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfiles for Alpaca, Vicuna, CodeLlama, SQLCoder, etc.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app exposing Ollama as a REST service with user quotas and admin panel.

title: ollama-cpp-py
summary: Low-level Python bindings to llama.cpp via Ollama’s backend for faster inference.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration: use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat template that connects to local Ollama with session memory and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK with async streaming and DI-friendly client.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, generate flashcards, or ask questions via Ollama.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot adding /ask and /draw slash commands powered by Ollama.
